SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_TDM_CMD# = "java -jar &UC4RB_TDM_PATH_JAR#" : SET &UC4RB_TDM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TDM_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! Add Base url : SET &UC4RB_TDM_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TDM_BASE_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TDM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TDM_CMD#, " -baseurl &UC4RB_TDM_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Add Username : SET &UC4RB_TDM_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TDM_USERNAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_TDM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TDM_CMD#, " -username &UC4RB_TDM_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_TDM_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_TDM_CMD#, " -ssl &UC4RB_TDM_SSL_VALIDATION#") ! Load package parameters : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used add arguments which are common for all actions. It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
